all of those protesters there in the

period of course Venezuela they tried
the opposition to get humanitarian aid
into the country they tried and failed

with quite extraordinary scenes there in

Maduro is watching
I suppose the obvious question for him
is how do you respond what is the next
move that might work when you have this
right there in the capital set against
you huge levels of support and cheers
from his supporters as he edges his way
through the crowds he'll eventually get
to a microphone to address all of those
people but of course one of the things
he has been urging is for the military
for soldiers to say this is the time to
depart and he welcomed those soldiers
that defected across the border to
Colombia but he will have hoped that
more would follow suit and adding
pressure on Nicolas Maduro and that has
not so far happened with the bulk of the
military staying loyal to the president
but all of those questions
that were posed before one Guido left
the country they are still very much at
play now as we watch these live pictures
because what the military does that
still is very much a live question
trying to get humanitarian aid into the
country that is very much a live
question
trying to just break this logjam between
these two principal political figures in
Venezuela that is still a live question
and it is anyone's guess as to where
this actually goes in the coming days
Nicolas Maduro despite all of the
pressure on the streets there in Caracas
the International political pressure
from all of those countries that now say
they recognize this man as the interim
leader of Venezuela Nicolas Maduro
refusing to accept any of that
and I suppose critically he still has
the port support nicolas maduro of
Russia and of China and in terms of the
global politics that is hugely important
in terms of his ability to stay in
office in Venezuela despite all of this
crescendo of noise of pressure that you
are seeing there on the streets nicolas
maduro digging in and i think as long as
the military stay with him as long as
the Russians the Chinese offer their
assistance it has the potential to get
drawn out into a very long time scale of
this sort of dynamic that has the
president in office and has this
opposition leader with so much street
support
